scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:server" "npm run start:client" "npm run start:file-api"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd Server && npm install && cd ../Client-UI && npm install && cd ../File-Api && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run watch:server" "cd Server && npm run dev:broadcast" "cd Server && npm run dev:worker" "cd Server && npm run dev:scheduled-queue" "npm run watch:client" "npm run watch:file-api"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run watch:server" "cd Server && npm run dev:broadcast" "cd Server && npm run dev:worker" "cd Server && npm run dev:scheduled-queue" "npm run watch:client" "npm run watch:file-api"
scripts.dev:new: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n "SERVER,BCAST_SRV,BCAST_WRK,DRIP_WRK,SCHED_WRK,CLIENT,FILE_API" -c "bgBlue,bgMagenta,bgCyan,bgGreen,bgRed,bgYellow,bgWhite" "npm:watch:server" "cd Server && npm run dev:broadcast" "cd Server && npm run dev:worker" "npm:start:drip-worker" "npm:start:scheduled-worker" "npm:watch:client" "npm:watch:file-api"
scripts.workers:start: npm run workers:broadcast:start && npm run workers:drip:start && npm run workers:scheduled:start
scripts.workers:stop: pm2 stop broadcast-worker drip-worker scheduled-worker || true
scripts.workers:restart: pm2 restart broadcast-worker drip-worker scheduled-worker || true
scripts.workers:delete: pm2 delete broadcast-worker drip-worker scheduled-worker || true
scripts.deploy:prepare: npm run build && npm run db:migrate
